Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 by both parties. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you decide to purchase this product, you can enjoy it at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is valid for a limited time only, so I encourage you to make your decision soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
